      • MovingTank

        MovingTank​(double x,
           double y,
           int levelSizeX,
           int levelSizeY,
           int delay,
           Level level)
        Constructs a MovingTank Sets lastFired to the current time
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the MovingTank
        y - the y position of the MovingTank
        levelSizeX - the x size of the Level
        levelSizeY - the y size of the Level
        delay - the delay between frames
        level - the Level that the MovingTank is in
